name: Alice Green
bio: Alice has 10 years of experience in caring for indoor plants and air-purifying plants.

name: John Leaf
bio: John specializes in succulents and low-maintenance plants, helping urban homes stay green.

name: Sophia Flora
bio: Sophia is an expert in plants that improve indoor air quality and overall home ambiance.

name: Michael Roots
bio: Michael helps people style their homes with plants for both aesthetics and wellness.

name: Emma Bloom
bio: Emma specializes in tropical plants and teaches people how to maintain humidity-friendly environments.

name: Liam Fern
bio: Liam has extensive experience in outdoor gardens and landscape plant design.
